ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Interball Tail Wide-range 3D Ion Spectrometer (CORALL) Linearly Interpolated 60 s Resolution data in GSE Coordinates
ResourceHeader.Description: Interball-1 Wide-range 3D Ion Spectrometer (CORALL) linearly interpolated to have the measurements on the minute at 60 s resolution data in GSE coordinates. This data set consists of processed solar wind data that has been linearly interpolated to 1 min resolution at the position of the spacecraft using the interp1.m function in MATLAB. This data set was originally constructed by Dr. J.M. Weygand for Prof. R.L. McPherron, who was the principle investigator of two National Science Foundation studies: GEM Grant ATM 02-1798 and a Space Weather Grant ATM 02-08501. These data were primarily used in superposed epoch studies and cross correlation studies on solar wind.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: IKI RAN and INTERCOSMOS of the Republic of Cuba, Reynal Jimenez

PublicationInfo.Authors: Weygand, James, M; McPherron, Robert, L

InformationURL.Name: Wide-range 3D Ion Spectrometer (CORALL)
InformationURL.Description: CORALL is a hemispherical electrostatic ion energy spectrometer with a fan-shaped field-of-view of 10 x 150 degrees.

InformationURL.Name: Solar Wind Propagation Information
InformationURL.Description: Solar wind archive at UCLA. This archive provides a list of available data resources and available time ranges.

AccessURL.Name: IGPP UCLA Interball CORALL Data JMW Processed Archive

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: IKI RAN and INTERCOSMOS of the Republic of Cuba;Reynal Jimenez;James.M.Weygand

TimeSpan.Note: Time format in data files is: Day Month Year Hour Minute Second (DD MM YYYY HH MM SS.SSS)

Parameter.Name: Universal Time
Parameter.Description: Interpolated universal time columns from left to right are: day month year hour minute sec in the format of dd mm yyyy hh mm ss.

Structure.Description: Universal Time expressed using a 6-column day, month, year, hour, minute, second representation

Parameter.Name: Interball-1 CORALL Density Interpolated to 1 min Resolution in GSE Coordinates
Parameter.Description: Density for Interball-1 CORALL in units of number per cubic centimeter in GSE coordinates.

Parameter.Name: Interball-1 CORALL Thermal Speed Interpolated to 1 min Resolution in GSE Coordinates
Parameter.Description: Interball-1 CORALL thermal speed in units of km/s in GSE coordinates.
Parameter.Caveats: Be sure you understand the instrument

Parameter.Name: Interball-1 CORALL Velocity Vector Interpolated to 1 min Resolution in GSE Coordinates
Parameter.Description: Flow vector for Interball-1 CORALL in GSE coordinates in units of km/s.
Parameter.Caveats: Be sure you understand the instrument

Parameter.Name: Interball-1 Spacecraft Position Vector Interpolated to 1 min Resolution in GSE Coordinates
Parameter.Description: Location of the spacecraft in GSE coordinates in units of Re
